name: Yohannes Terfa
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Results-driven Fullstack Developer specializing in implementing scalable backend solutions, REST APIs, and automation tools using Spring Boot, Kubernetes, and Jenkins. Skilled in delivering user-focused platforms, including EKYC management systems and financial education dashboards. Committed to clean architecture, test-driven development, and optimizing operational processes.

experience.description: Build REST APIs interfacing the core Mpesa System using SOAP Web Services. Develop custom backends for new products with Spring Boot. Automate operational tasks into microservices. Follow Clean Architecture and Test-Driven Development. Implement CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and ArgoCD.

Provided L1 support for technical issues on the EKYC platform. Collaborated with the Dev team to identify and resolve production issues. Managed EKYC devices (POS). Automated EKYC device management with a custom portal.
Built test cases for new and existing features. Performed manual testing and reported issues. Automated tests using Selenium, Cypress, and Kaaptivate.
Developed a financial literacy dashboard for kids. Converted UI/UX designs from Figma into a React.js frontend. Built a robust Django backend to handle business logic.

projects.name: Flip Academy - Flip and Floss INC
projects.description: A dashboard for kids to learn financial literacy with parental guidance and involvement.

projects.name: EDM (EKYC Device Management) - Safaricom Ethiopia
projects.description: A dashboard for the sales team to effectively manage and oversee EKYC device distribution.

projects.name: OTP Payment Middleware - M-PESA Safaricom Ethiopia
projects.description: A Spring Boot service that handles OTP-based payments, consuming a SOAP web service for transaction processing.

projects.name: Fuel Payment - M-PESA Safaricom Ethiopia
projects.description: A Spring Boot service handling fuel payments through a REST API that consumes a SOAP web service. Includes a reconciliation cron job to cancel payments without proper callbacks.

projects.name: Cashier Incentive - M-PESA Safaricom Ethiopia
projects.description: A Spring Boot service that enables campaign organizers to register cashiers and supermarkets, configure incentive metrics and SMS templates, and automate incentive payouts for transactions.
